Articles.Content:
I create a simple prograde maneuver to raise my Ap but the Blue maneuver Node indicator will drift up. It seems to want to drift to the very top of the navball and then stop. It doesn't matter what maneuver I'm creating. It always drifts to the top. Also, The more deltaV the maneuver requires, the slower it will drift. Example; if the maneuver requires only 0.1  dV, then it almost instantly drifts to the top within about 1 second. If the burn is like 20 dV then it drifts much slower
